channel.title: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[
channel.description: hey i forgot to add drops to npc's because i am trying to make bandos dro pags'es with a 1 in 100 chance bgses 1 in 75 and bandos tassys and chest plate 1 in 50. Please do not flame me, i am a newer coder who forgot how to add drops. help is apreciated. THANKS =]

item.title: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

oh for the love of god ! i know that i’m patient with noobys, but you sir are impossible!!

do you have your npcdrops.cfg?

Read full topic
item.source: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[

item.title: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[
item.dc:creator: @Skilled_Moms Skilled Moms
item.description:
@Skilled_Moms wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:24, topic:358025”]this is an egzample of what it should look like ( in npcdrops.cfg )

//dark beast npcdrop = 2783 526 1 100

This

//dark beast

is your npc name ( u can edit it )

This

npcdrop = 2783

confirms your npc and it’s ID.

Numbers

526	1	100

526 is item you want your npc to drop
1 is amount that you want your npc to drop
100 is percentage , so 100 means that this monster drops the item 100%[/quote]
can not find any of that shit.

Read full topic

1 is amount that you want your npc to drop
100 is percentage , so 100 means that this monster drops the item 100%

item.title: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[
item.dc:creator: @Skilled_Moms Skilled Moms
item.description:
@Skilled_Moms wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:17, topic:358025”]If it is like my server do this -

Source files/Config

Then look for Npcdrops.CFG

Control + F for an npc your wanting to add or copy off or whatever.

npcdrop = NPCID(Tab)ITEMID(Tab)Amount(tab)RARITY

The CFG file, for me looks like a NOTEPAD![/quote]
Theres only one file that comes up called npc handler. add it to that?

Read full topic

item.title: Easy question forgot how to add drops =[
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

In your source look for the file:

“npcdrop.cfg”

After paste:

“npcdrop = 1115 3 35 1”

at the bottom before:

“[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]”

Save and compile.

That should work.
Scapescape has droptypes and I don’t know what they are stand for. You are just going to have to change it and find out.

Read full topic
